pr_title: Qute - fix default template extensions for java.util.Map

timeline.bodyText: This one is a bit weird, isn't it? You're doing map.get("get") AFAICS?

replies.bodyText: Good catch! This one should be removed...

timeline.bodyText: You can also use map.getOrDefault(name, Result.NOT_FOUND); here
